title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When selecting 'Close all saved' option, the file does not always close.
EB: The file should close when selecting 'Close all saved' option, as no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Make sure some of the files are saved and some are not saved.
3. Click on 'Close all saved' option from the menu.
4. Verify that all saved files are closed and unsaved files remain open.
